paper_metadata.title: Genetic Testing in Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer Using Massive Parallel Sequencing
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In total 14 GS Junior runs, we identified 14 patients with deleterious mutations of which 7 are frameshift mutations, 4 are nonsense, 2 are missense, and 1 is an in frame deletion that affects splicing.

functional_data.summary: The deletion was detected both in heterozygosity and homozygosity.

variants.segregation_data: The pathogenic variants were all detected in heterozygosity.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is located in intron 11.
key_quotes: Deletion of c.6841+79delTTAA in intron 11 of the BRCA2 gene was detected both in heterozygosity and homozygosity.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Sanger sequencing identified one deletion, one insertion, and a combined InDel (c.4030del6insC, c.5189dupA, and c.5722_5723delCT in the BRCA2 gene).

functional_data.summary: The deletion was confirmed by Sanger sequencing.

variants.segregation_data: The pathogenic variants were all detected in heterozygosity.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is part of a combined InDel.
key_quotes: Sanger sequencing identified one deletion, one insertion, and a combined InDel (c.4030del6insC, c.5189dupA, and c.5722_5723delCT in the BRCA2 gene).

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We have identified 5 novel mutations in our cohort. Mutation c.2900_2901dupCT in the BRCA1 gene and mutations c.4030del6insC, c.5189dupA, c.8009delC, and c.9274delT in the BRCA2 gene are mutations not described previously.

functional_data.summary: The deletion is novel and has not been described previously.

variants.segregation_data: The pathogenic variants were all detected in heterozygosity.
